bibl.title: Greek Papyri from Kellis. I (P. Kell. G.) Nos 1-90. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 3 = Oxbow Monograph 54.)
bibl.note: P. Kellis Gr. I, 1-90. - 83 texts written on papyrus, 7 on wood, from the fourth century A.D.: documents and letters (1-81), astrological, magical and medical texts (82-89), school exercise (90).
bibl.seg: WORP K.A. (edited by), in collaboration with J.E.G. WHITEHORNE and R.W. DANIEL, Greek Papyri from Kellis. I (P. Kell. G.) Nos 1-90. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 3 = Oxbow Monograph 54.)
Oxford, Oxbow Books, 1995, 4°, xi-281 pp., 2 plans et 79 pll. ISBN 0-946897-97-2. £45.
P. Kellis Gr. I, 1-90. - 83 texts written on papyrus, 7 on wood, from the fourth century A.D.: documents and letters (1-81), astrological, magical and medical texts (82-89), school exercise (90).

C.R. par Richard Alston, CR N.S., 47 (1997) pp. 180-181. - Sergio Daris, Aegyptus 77 (1997) pp. 139-142. - Jean-Luc Fournet, REG 111 (1998) pp. 763-766. - Jean Gascou, BibO 54 (1997) coll. 374-379. - Andrea Jördens, MBAH 17 (1998) No. 1, pp. 121-132. - Jennifer A. Sheridan, BASP 35 (1998) pp. 103-106. - J. David Thomas, JEA 84 (1998) pp. 261-263. - Traianos Gagos, JRA 12 (1999) pp. 752-762.
